fr.cnes.sitools.notification.business
Class NotifierFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Restlet
      org.restlet.routing.Filter
          fr.cnes.sitools.notification.business.NotifierFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.restlet.Uniform
public class NotifierFilter
extends org.restlet.routing.Filter

The aim is to make the notification as transparent as possible from an observable object point of view. 1. For an application that shows observable we attach a NotifyFilter that watches after each request handle if an observable attribute is present in the answer, and if yes get this notification object. 2. For a server resource object, we add in the response attributes a boolean Observable set to true and a notification object indicating the observable UUID, a status, and a message for observers.

Author:
jp.boignard (AKKA Technologies)
